name: Nikwax TX-10 Down Proof Waterproofer 300ml
description: Increase the effectiveness of down insulation in damp conditions. This treatment reduces the water absorbency of down and adding water repellency to the outer shell of your garment or insulated gear.For down sleeping bags and garments, use a front-loading washing machine.Pre-wash with Down Wash or another mild soap before treatment.Treatment may reduce breathability of laminated or coated garments slightly. Use a spray repellency restorer if this is a concern.
